details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.18 Annotations - 7.18.8 PrinterMark - Logical structure
details.description: PrinterMark annotations, if present, shall be considered Incidental Artifacts, as if they are hidden page elements as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.2.2.3.

rule.description: PrinterMark annotations, if present, shall be considered Incidental Artifacts, as if they are hidden page elements as defined in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.2.2.3.

error.message: A PrinterMark annotation is included in logical structure
